apple_vendor_description: The kiss emoji on Apple devices showcases a tender moment between a man and a woman, each rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting. The medium-dark skin tone of the man and the medium skin tone of the woman are depicted with soft, subtle curves, evoking intimacy and affection. On Apple devices, this emoji is a direct and heartfelt way to express romantic love, passion, or a deep emotional bond.
